targets.query:
line_item_usage_account_id.keyword:$account_id AND line_item_line_item_type.keyword: EdpDiscount OR
line_item_line_item_type.keyword: PrivateRateDiscount

line_item_usage_account_id.keyword:$account_id AND 
(
  line_item_product_code:*aws* OR 
  line_item_product_code: *amazon*
) AND
line_item_usage_type:datatransfer

line_item_usage_account_id.keyword:$account_id AND 
(
  line_item_product_code:*aws* OR 
  line_item_product_code: *amazon*
) AND
line_item_usage_type:datatransfer

line_item_usage_account_id.keyword:$account_id AND 
(
  line_item_product_code:*aws* OR 
  line_item_product_code: *amazon*
) AND
line_item_usage_type:datatransfer

(
  line_item_product_code:*aws* OR 
  line_item_product_code: *amazon*
) AND
line_item_usage_type:datatransfer
